Title: A basic task
Description: Can substiture participants name with a percent sign followed by M or F. Can also substiture a random die result with a percent sign followed by D

Title: A counted task
Description: A task that will be performed multiple times based on how many times this task has been visited. The visit count will be multiplied by the number that immediately follows a percent sign.  Can also use a percent sign followed by an F or M to substiture the participant's names.

Title: Task 4 - VISIT_TIME
Description: A task that will be performed multiple minutes based on how many times this task has been visited. The visit count will be multiplied by the number that immediately follows a percent sign.  Can also use a percent sign followed by an F or M to substiture the participant's names.

Title: Task 5 - SELECTION
Description: Can substiture participants name with a percent sign followed by M or F. Can also substiture a random die result with a percent sign followed by D
Extra 1: In the individual selections you can use the following characters after a percent sign:
Extra 2: M or F for a substitute of the participants' names
Extra 4: Tx, where x is a task number. If this selection is picked, the state will automatically advance to that particular task
Extra 5: any number. That number will be multiplied by a single die roll and the result used as the starting value for a timer

Title: Task 7 - COUNT
Description: Can substiture participants name with a percent sign followed by M or F. Can also substiture a random die result with a percent sign followed by D

Title: Task 8 - TIME
Description: Can substiture participants name with a percent sign followed by M or F. Can also substiture a random die result with a percent sign followed by D. The result of the die roll will be used a the basis for a timer

Title: Task 9 - GOTO
Description: Can substiture participants name with a percent sign followed by M or F. Can also substiture a random die result with a percent sign followed by D. The value listed in the "Extra 1" column will automatically become the next active task
